title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 09 February 2015 - XWiki
content:
<momomomomo> has quit  
00:45 <momomomomo> has joined #xwiki  
01:16 <momomomomo> has quit  
01:23 <momomomomo> has joined #xwiki  
02:52 <momomomomo> has quit  
03:14 <momomomomo> has joined #xwiki  
03:32 <momomomomo> has quit  
08:10 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
08:18 <vrachieru> has joined #xwiki  
08:39 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
08:54 <vmassol> good morning, today is 7.0M1 release day! :)  
09:08 <Pbas> has joined #xwiki  
09:10 <gsmeria> has joined #xwiki  
09:17 <tmortagne> common should be back to stable, sorry for the noise  
09:19 <tmortagne> re 7.0M1 release, would be nice to have a 6.4.1  
09:22 <vmassol> tmortagne: it was stable, I fixed commons/renderinf and platform over the week end  
09:23 <tmortagne> vmassol: I did not said it was unstable before my first commit, I even said "sorry"...  
09:23 <vmassol> "common should be back to stable" means it wasn't stable  
09:23 <vmassol> which is not what I noticed  
09:23 <tmortagne> yes it was  
09:23 <tmortagne> after my first commit  
09:24 <vmassol> oh  
09:24 <vmassol> ok got it  
09:29 <cjd> has joined #xwiki  
09:35 <woshilapin> has joined #xwiki  
09:38 <gdelhumeau> has joined #xwiki  
09:41 <[d\_\_d]> has quit  
09:42 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
09:43 <mflorea> has quit  
09:43 <mflorea1> has joined #xwiki  
10:28 <Enygma`> has joined #xwiki  
10:30 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
10:37 <vmassol> Enygma`, evalica: good morning.  
10:37 <vmassol> today is release day for 7.0M1 and it would be good to release 6.4.1 too  
10:37 <Enygma`> hi vmassol  
10:38 <Enygma`> I will start 7.0m1 soon  
10:38 <Enygma`> check tests, etc  
10:38 <vmassol> I've tried to fix build issues during the weekend but there are still quite a lot of failing func tests  
10:38 <vmassol> oh the build is much worse right now than over the week end  
10:39 <vmassol> probably thomas' commit  
10:39 <tmortagne> vmassol: should be fixed now  
10:39 <tmortagne> would be better to release 6.4.1 others are stabilizing master  
10:39 <vmassol> ok  
10:39 <tmortagne> s/others/while others/  
10:40 <vmassol> this one looks like a real bug: http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-enterprise-test-ui-6.4.x/lastBuild/org.xwiki.enterprise$xwiki-enterprise-test-ui/testReport/org.xwiki.test.ui.appwithinminutes/WizardTest/testCreateApplication/  
10:40 <tmortagne> crap cyclomaic complexity  
10:40 <Enygma`> has quit  
10:40 <vmassol> mflorea1: could you look into it asap?  
10:41 <evalica> vmassol: I am not ready for 6.4.1 today. We still need the translations.  
10:41 <mflorea1> vmassol: I already did, http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-9386  
10:42 <vmassol> could someone check the LDAP tests http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-enterprise-test-ldap-6.4.x/ ? (on my side I need to work on some large mail api refactoring asap)  
10:42 <mflorea1> sorry, not this one  
10:42 <Enygma`> has joined #xwiki  
10:42 <mflorea1> http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-11770  
10:42 <mflorea1> this one  
10:42 <vmassol> the test is new?  
10:43 <vmassol> (because it wasn't failing before AFAIK)  
10:44 <mflorea1> no, the test is old, but I added unicode chars to cover http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-11747 and so we discover XWIKI-11770  
10:44 <vmassol> yes ok it's new (that's what I meant)  
10:44 <vmassol> so the question is when do we plan to fix those 2 issues  
10:44 <mflorea1> there are two options: either fix XWQL to support unicode or use HQL in AWM instead of XWQL  
10:44 <vmassol> if not now then we may want to disable this part of the test for now  
10:45 <mflorea1> the first issue is fixed, but with the fix we discovered the other issue  
10:46 <mflorea1> the quickest is to replace XWQL with HQL  
10:46 <vmassol> mflorea1: if HQL supports unicode is it hard to have XWQL support it?  
10:46 <vmassol> (since it translates into HQL)  
10:47 <mflorea1> I've no idea, I guess we need to change a bit the grammar of the XWQL to accept unicode chars in the doc.object(XXX) syntax  
10:47 <vmassol> it could be quicker to have XWQL support unicode than move to AWM actually  
10:47 <vmassol> :)  
10:48 <mflorea1> afaics, there is only one query to tranform to HQL, but fixing this one might show others.  
10:49 <mflorea1> (i.e. there is only one query that fails, but other may fail if we fit it and the test passes after that point)  
10:52 <vmassol> IMO it could be good to quickly perform an analysis on the XWQL translation code to see where the unicode issue could come from  
10:53 <vmassol> and then we can decide what to do depending on ho much work there is. Say, spend 1 hour on it and if nothing is found, use HQL for ex? WDYT?  
10:53 <mflorea1> sure  
10:53 <mflorea1> I will take a look  
10:53 <mflorea1> short  look  
10:55 <vmassol> ok cool, thanks, yes short ;)  
10:58 <Enygma`> tmortagne: are you working on http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-platform/852/?  
10:59 <Enygma`> akins because the recent push on commons handles a checkstyle problem, but the previous platform build has failed tests that do not seem related  
10:59 <Enygma`> \*asking  
11:03 <tmortagne> Enygma`: there was several commits after build 852  
11:04 <tmortagne> my last commit fixed several failing tests for sure, waiting now  
11:04 <tmortagne> \*commits  
11:04 <Enygma`> ok, that`s what I was asking  
11:26 <gsmeria> has quit  
11:30 <ClemensR> has joined #xwiki  
11:44 <tmortagne> Enygma`: xwiki-platform\_Quality\_Checks is ok so I guess it's ok this time  
11:50 <KermitTheFragger> has joined #xwiki  
11:58 <gsmeria> has joined #xwiki  
12:27 <gdelhumeau> has quit  
12:29 <gdelhumeau> has joined #xwiki  
12:32 <vmassol> mflorea1: cool :) (just saw your last comment in the jira issue)  
12:33 <mflorea1> I'm going to quote the class name in AWM  
12:33 <vmassol> yep ok  
13:10 <Enygma`> gdelhumeau: there is http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-11750 and mflorea1: there is http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-11757  
13:10 <Enygma`> bott are marked as regressions and blockers  
13:10 <Enygma`> \*both  
13:10 <gdelhumeau> XWIKI-11750 is there since 6.2actually  
13:10 <Enygma`> is there any plan to do something about them, today, or should I push them to 7.0M2 as well?  
13:11 <gdelhumeau> it won't be fixed today for sure  
13:11 <Enygma`> I see  
13:15 <Enygma`> pushed both issues to 7.0M2  
13:17 <Enygma`> Reminder: missing documentation on XWIKI-11719 ( vmassol ) and XWIKI-11252 ( tmortagne )  
13:18 <tmortagne> Enygma`: I probably won't have time to take care of this today (big thing) but should not block the release  
13:20 <Enygma`> tmortagne: ok, will just comment on the issue in order to not forget  
13:20 <tmortagne> sure  
13:30 <vmassol> Enygma`: thanks, adding doc for http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-11719  
13:31 <Enygma`> cool, thx  
13:44 <vmassol> Enygma`: done  
13:45 <Enygma`> thx  
13:47 <Slashman> has joined #xwiki  
13:51 <ClemensR> has left #xwiki  
14:02 <Slashman> has quit  
14:04 <Slashman> has joined #xwiki  
14:17 <[d\_\_d]> has joined #xwiki  
14:31 <ClemensR> has joined #xwiki  
15:05 <tmortagne> Enygma`: looks like I forgot to remove the ssh key from by github account  
15:06 <tmortagne> I'm surprised you did not get any error when you tried to add it  
15:06 <tmortagne> should be ok now  
15:08 <Enygma`> tmortagne: weird  
15:08 <Enygma`> here it says that you pushed 1 commit, but that I have authored it  
15:08 <Enygma`> on github it does not mention you  
15:10 <tmortagne> you are the author because it's your id in the commit, the ssh is used only for the push  
15:10 <tmortagne> not sure why github does not mention it  
15:10 <tmortagne> anyway now it should be ok  
15:12 <Enygma`> ok  
15:24 <Enygma`> tmortagne: lol, after you have removed the ssh key from your account it does not allow me to use it. I probably need to remove and add it again to my account  
15:24 <tmortagne> Enygma`: did it really added it to your account ?  
15:25 <Enygma`> I made the commit from the agent, so it was added  
15:26 <tmortagne> you made the push with my account :)  
15:26 <Enygma`> hm, actually I know what happened  
15:26 <Enygma`> I`ve used the key from maven instead of the agent  
15:26 <Enygma`> and yes, the commit was with your account but with my gitconfig :)  
15:27 <Enygma`> got a bit confused there  
15:33 <ClemensR> has left #xwiki
